      org.giiwa.app.web.admin中Controller的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  accesslog
      web api: /admin/accesslog
      used to access the "accesslog",
      required "access.logs.admin"
      class  app
      web api: /admin/app
      used to manage appid
      class  backup
      backup management,
      required "access.config.admin"
      class  browserinfo
      web api: /admin/token
      used to manage user
      required "access.user.admin"

      web api: /admin/syslog
      used to manage oplog,
      required "access.logs.admin"

      web api: /admin/dashboard
      used to show dashboard
      class  database
      backup management,
      required "access.config.admin"
      class  dfile 
      class  footprint
      web api: /admin/footprint
      used to manage footprint,
      required "access.logs.admin"
      class  i18n
      some setting of the module
      class  index
      web api: /admin
      used to show home of admin
      class  logs
      web api: /admin/logs
      used to manage oplog,
      required "access.logs.admin"
      class  module
      web api: /admin/module
      used to manage modules,
      required "access.config.admin" except "create a module"
      class  monitor 
      class  mq 
      class  node
      web api: /admin/node
      used to manage user
      required "access.user.admin"
      class  profile 
      static class  profile.my 
      class  role
      web api: /admin/role
      used toe manage role,
      required "access.role.admin"
      class  setting
      web api: /admin/setting
      use to custom setting, all module configuration MUST inherit from this class, and override the "set" and "get" method,
      required "access.config.admin"
      static class  setting.counter 
      static class  setting.smtp 
      static class  setting.system 
      class  setup
      web api: /setup
      used to the initial configure, once configured, it will not be accessed
      class  sysinfo
      web api: /admin/task
      used to manage task,
      required "access.config.admin"

      web api: /admin/syslog
      used to manage oplog,
      required "access.logs.admin"

      web api: /admin/task

      required "access.config.admin"

      web api: /admin/system
      used to control the "system"
      required "access.config.admin"

      required "access.config.admin"

    • org.giiwa.web中Controller的使用

      返回Controller的org.giiwa.web中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Controller Module.getModel(java.lang.String method, java.lang.Class<? extends Controller> clazz) 
      static Controller Controller.getModel(java.lang.String method, java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String original)
      Gets the model.
      Controller Module.getModel(java.lang.String method, java.lang.String uri, java.lang.String original)
      Load model.
      Controller Module.loadModelFromCache(java.lang.String method, java.lang.String uri)
      Load model from cache.
      Controller Controller.put(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object o)
      Put the name=object to the model.
      Controller Controller.set(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object o)
      Sets name=object back to model which accessed by view.
      参数类型为Controller的org.giiwa.web中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default boolean IFilter.after(Controller m)
      after dispatched to the model
      boolean Module.after(Controller m)
      handle by filter and invoke the after
      default boolean IFilter.before(Controller m)
      before dispatch to the model
      boolean Module.before(Controller m)
      handle by filter ad invoke the before
      QueryString QueryString.copy(Controller m)
      Copy.
      void Controller.copy(Controller m)
      Copy all request params from the model.
      java.lang.String Language.parse(java.lang.String str, Controller m)
      Parses the string with the model using velocity engine
      类型变量类型为Controller的org.giiwa.web中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Path Controller.forward(java.lang.Class<? extends Controller> clazz)
      forward or lets the clazz to handle the request
      Controller Module.getModel(java.lang.String method, java.lang.Class<? extends Controller> clazz) 
      static java.lang.String Module.shortName(java.lang.Class<? extends Controller> model)
      return the shortname of the class, cut the prefix by module package
